201.description: The transcription job has been initiated

400.description: Something is wrong with the request

401.description: You don't have the permissions to initiate a new transcription job

422.description: The parameters you gave are incorrect

get.summary: Get transcription jobs based on query parameters

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for pagination. A value of 0 starts from the first item.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Useful for pagination and controlling data payload size.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Filter items relevant to a specific date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: before_date
parameters.description: Include items that occurred before the specified date in ISO format.

parameters.name: after_date
parameters.description: Filter for items after the specified date. Use with `before_date` for a range. Date in ISO format.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter the list based on item status. Accepts multiple values from the predefined list.

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Filter the list based on the item type. Supports multiple values from the predefined list.

200.description: A list of transcription jobs matching the parameters.

401.description: You don't have the permissions to access transcription jobs

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the transcription job

401.description: You don't have the permissions to access the transcription job

404.description: The transcription job doesn't exist or has been deleted

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the transcription job

202.description: The transcription job has been successfully deleted

401.description: You don't have the permissions to delete this transcription job

403.description: The transcription job is not in a deletable state

404.description: The transcription job doesn't exist or has been deleted

get.summary: Download the audio file used for this transcription job

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the transcription job

200.description: The audio file used for this transcription job

401.description: You don't have the permissions to access this transcription job or its audio file

404.description: The transcription job or its audio file doesn't exist or has been deleted

post.summary: Upload an audio file or provide an audio URL for processing

audio.description: The file to be uploaded. This should be an audio or video file.

audio_url.description: The URL of the audio or video file to be uploaded.

post.summary: Initiate a new pre recorded job

201.description: The pre recorded job has been initiated

400.description: Something is wrong with the request

401.description: You don't have the permissions to initiate a new pre recorded job

422.description: The parameters you gave are incorrect

get.summary: Get pre recorded jobs based on query parameters

parameters.name: offset

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Useful for pagination and controlling data payload size.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Filter items relevant to a specific date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: before_date
parameters.description: Include items that occurred before the specified date in ISO format.

parameters.name: after_date
parameters.description: Filter for items after the specified date. Use with `before_date` for a range. Date in ISO format.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter the list based on item status. Accepts multiple values from the predefined list.

200.description: A list of pre recorded jobs matching the parameters.

401.description: You don't have the permissions to access pre recorded jobs

maximum_duration.description: Maximum duration of a subtitle in seconds

maximum_characters_per_row.description: Maximum number of characters per row in a subtitle

maximum_rows_per_caption.description: Maximum number of rows per caption

number_of_speakers.description: Exact number of speakers in the audio

min_speakers.description: Minimum number of speakers in the audio

max_speakers.description: Maximum number of speakers in the audio

model.description: Model you want the translation model to use to translate

match_original_utterances.description: Align translated utterances with the original ones

classes.description: The list of classes to extract from the audio transcription

diarization.description: Enable speaker recognition (diarization) for this audio

name_consistency.description: **[Alpha]** Enable names consistency for this audio

custom_spelling.description: **[Alpha]** Enable custom spelling for this audio

structured_data_extraction.description: **[Alpha]** Enable structured data extraction for this audio

sentiment_analysis.description: **[Alpha]** Enable sentiment analysis for this audio

audio_to_llm.description: **[Alpha]** Enable audio to llm processing for this audio

custom_metadata.description: Custom metadata you can attach to this transcription

display_mode.description: **[Alpha]** Allows to change the output display_mode for this audio. The output will be reordered, creating new utterances when speakers overlapped

diarization_enhanced.description: Use enhanced diarization for this audio

audio_url.description: URL to a Gladia file or to an external audio or video file

result_url.description: Prebuilt URL with your transcription `id` to fetch the result

timestamp.description: Date of when the error occurred

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the error

validation_errors.description: List of validation errors, if any

timestamp.description: Date of when the error occurred

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the error

timestamp.description: Date of when the error occurred

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the error

filename.description: The name of the uploaded file

source.description: The link used to download the file if audio_url was used

number_of_channels.description: Number of channels in the audio file

StreamingSupportedEncodingEnum.description: The encoding format of the audio stream. We support 8, 16, 24 and 32 bits PCM, 8 bits A-law, and 8 bits μ-law.

StreamingSupportedBitDepthEnum.description: The bit depth of the audio stream

StreamingSupportedSampleRateEnum.description: The sample rate of the audio stream

StreamingModelEnum.description: The transcription model to use. The "fast" model is optimized for speed, while the "accurate" model is optimized for accuracy

languages.description: If one language is set, it will be used for the transcription. Otherwise, language will be auto-detected by the model. If multiple languages are set, the model will only detect between those languages.

code_switching.description: If true, language will be auto-detected on each utterance. Otherwise, language will be auto-detected on first utterance and then used for the rest of the transcription. If one language is set, this option will be ignored.

audio_enhancer.description: If true, apply pre-processing to the audio stream to enhance the quality.

vocabulary.description: Specific vocabulary list to feed the transcription model with

words_accurate_timestamps.description: If true, accurate timestamps will be provided for each word in the transcription.

custom_vocabulary.description: If true, enable custom vocabulary for the transcription.

custom_vocabulary_config.description: Custom vocabulary configuration, if `custom_vocabulary` is enabled

named_entity_recognition.description: If true, enable named entity recognition for the transcription.

sentiment_analysis.description: If true, enable sentiment analysis for the transcription.

summarization.description: If true, generates summarization for the whole transcription.

chapterization.description: If true, generates chapters for the whole transcription.

receive_partial_transcripts.description: If true, partial utterance will be sent to websocket.

receive_final_transcripts.description: If true, final utterance will be sent to websocket.

receive_speech_events.description: If true, begin and end speech events will be sent to websocket.

receive_pre_processing_events.description: If true, pre-processing events will be sent to websocket.

receive_realtime_processing_events.description: If true, realtime processing events will be sent to websocket.

receive_post_processing_events.description: If true, post-processing events will be sent to websocket.

receive_acknowledgments.description: If true, acknowledgments will be sent to websocket.

receive_errors.description: If true, errors will be sent to websocket.

receive_lifecycle_events.description: If true, lifecycle events will be sent to websocket.

url.description: URL on which we will do a `POST` request with configured messages

receive_partial_transcripts.description: If true, partial utterance will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_final_transcripts.description: If true, final utterance will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_speech_events.description: If true, begin and end speech events will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_pre_processing_events.description: If true, pre-processing events will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_realtime_processing_events.description: If true, realtime processing events will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_post_processing_events.description: If true, post-processing events will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_acknowledgments.description: If true, acknowledgments will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_errors.description: If true, errors will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_lifecycle_events.description: If true, lifecycle events will be sent to the defined callback.

channels.description: The number of channels of the audio stream

endpointing.description: The endpointing duration in seconds. Endpointing is the duration of silence which will cause an utterance to be considered as finished

maximum_duration_without_endpointing.description: The maximum duration in seconds without endpointing. If endpointing is not detected after this duration, current utterance will be considered as finished

callback.description: If true, messages will be sent to configured url.

status.description: "queued": the job has been queued. "processing": the job is being processed. "done": the job has been processed and the result is available. "error": an error occurred during the job's processing.

completed_at.description: Completion date when status is "done" or "error"

custom_metadata.description: Custom metadata given in the initial request

error_code.description: HTTP status code of the error if status is "error"

file.description: The file data you uploaded. Can be null if status is "error"

request_params.description: Parameters used for this live transcription. Can be null if status is "error"

result.description: Live transcription's result when status is "done"

post.description: Sent when a pre-recorded transcription job has been created
Sent when a pre-recorded transcription job is done and its results are available
Sent when an error occurred on a pre-recorded transcription job
Sent when a live session has been initiated
Sent when we received the first audio chunk of a live session
Sent when the live session recording has ended
Sent when the live session post-processing has ended and the results are available
